Alex, Melman och Gloria tar upp jakten på honom, men innan de vet ordet av har de blivit tillfångatagna och satta på en båt till Afrika. Regi: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath.

programme.title: Mästerkatten
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2011. Redan innan han träffade träsktrollet Shrek var mästerkatten ute på äventyr. Den här gången ger han sig iväg tillsammans med Kitty och den smarta Humpty Dumpty för att stjäla gåsen som lägger gyllene ägg.

programme.title: Prinsen av Egypten
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 1998. Faraon befaller att alla babypojkar ska dödas. En desperat mamma gömmer sin son Moses i en korg i vassen. Korgen hittas av drottningen och Moses får växa upp som bror till tronarvingen Ramses. Moses inser så småningom sitt hebreiska ursprung och Gud kallar på honom. Moses får rollen som budbärare i det hebreiska folkets kamp för frihet.

programme.title: Blixten och det magiska huset
programme.desc: Belgisk animerad film från 2013. Thunder är en övergiven katt som en stormig kväll söker skydd i ett märkligt slott. Här bor en pensionerad magiker med sina knasiga assistenter. Thunder är inte helt välkommen till att börja med, men då magikern hamnar på sjukhus hotas huset av en släkting som vill sälja det. Och då slår sig Thunder ihop med den andra inneboende för att rädda det magiska huset.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2001. Shrek är en jätte som bor i ett träsk. En dag bryts hans isolering av att hans verklighet invaderas av sagofigurer. Shrek ger sig ut för att undsätta den temperamentsfulla Prinsessan Fiona med hjälp av sin högljudda åsna.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2004. Shrek och Fiona blir bjudna till Fionas föräldrar, kungen och drottningen av Landet-i-fjärran. Framme i Landet-i-fjärran kantas gatorna av nyfikna undersåtar som alla hoppas på att få en glimt av Fionas prins. Chocken blir dock stor när den efterlängtade prinsen visar sig vara ett träsktroll och äktenskapet mellan Fiona och Shrek stämmer definitivt inte med kungens idé om ett lyckligt slut och han bestämmer sig för att göra sig av med sin svärson för gott.

programme.title: Finding you
programme.desc: Amerikanskt romantiskt drama från 2021. Efter en misslyckad provspelning på ett prestigefyllt musikuniversitet i New York reser violinisten Finley Sinclair till en irländsk kustby. Där ska han påbörja sin termin som utlandsstudent.

programme.title: The king of Staten Island
programme.desc: Amerikansk komedi från 2020. Scott har degat sedan hans far dog. Han spenderar dagarna med att bli hög och drömmer om att bli tatuerare. Nu måste han plötsligt hantera sin sorg och samtidigt ta sina första steg mot ett nytt liv.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's heroic death defending humanity, Batman and Wonder Woman bring together a team of superheroes that includes Aquaman, The Flash and Cyborg to defend the planet from an alien invasion led by the monstrous Steppenwolf.

programme.title: Rich & Shameless
programme.desc: Beyond the 'harmless fun' of wet t-shirt competitions and booze-fueled spring breaks and into dark back rooms with Joe Francis, where he would con young girls to take part in something far more sinister than flashing on a beach.

programme.desc: Beyond the 'harmless fun' of wet t-shirt competitions and booze-fueled spring breaks and into dark back rooms with Joe Francis, where he would con young girls to take part in something far more sinister than flashing on a beach.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's heroic death defending humanity, Batman and Wonder Woman bring together a team of superheroes that includes Aquaman, The Flash and Cyborg to defend the planet from an alien invasion led by the monstrous Steppenwolf.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: A troubled comedian in Gotham City descends into a life of unhinged criminality, and develops an alter-ego that comes to be known as The Joker.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Tammy is reunited with her ex-husband, who disappeared after embezzling $80 million in Katrina relief funds, after he is linked to the murder of a crime boss' son.Guests: Ed Quinn..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While investigating a deadly accident at a naval base, the NCIS team finds out a unit of Seabees was poisoned with a contagious supervirus. Also, during an autopsy, Wade is infected with the virus and given hours to live if an antidote can't be found.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After the NCIS team uncovers a link between a drug ring and the New Orleans Police Department, Lasalle must investigate his former partner in the Vice unit. Also, Pride worries about Rita's safety as she looks into illegal activity in Clearwater.Guests: Chelsea Field..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While Pride listens in on a wiretap of Mayor Hamilton, the NCIS team investigates a train heist of hundreds of Navy weapons.Guests: Sheryl Crow..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After the Belle Chase Navy Chaplain and pastor at Clearwater Baptist is murdered, Pride believes he found a connection between Mayor Hamilton and the illegal activity taking place in Clearwater. Also, Percy continues to face repercussions from a case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride is spotted tracking one of Mayor Hamilton's accomplices, the suspect opens fire on a crowded street before disappearing.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A cybersecurity expert investigates his friend's suspicious death.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A savvy NYPD cop is recruited by a secret government organization to help control Earth's alien population.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Two secret agents are called in to battle an alien disguised as a lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: History is altered and planet earth jeopardised when an alien kills a top-secret agent in 1969. The agent's partner must travel back in time and work with a younger version of the murdered agent to restore the timeline and save humankind.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An aging, over-the-hill assassin is hunted by a younger cloned version of himself.

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: A vampire-human hybrid struggles to save the human race from those who want to destroy it.

programme.title: Blade II
programme.desc: A vampire-human hybrid struggles to save the human race from those who want to destroy it.

programme.title: Blade: Trinity
programme.desc: Blade teams up with vampire hunters to stop the vampires from taking over the world.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team discovers a surveillance van filled with photos documenting Special Agent Pride's every move after his daughter is attacked on campus and placed in protective custody.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy lieutenant during a French Quarter second line funeral procession, a New Orleans tradition that celebrates the recently deceased with a musical parade.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a navy lieutenant dies during a clandestine visit to a general's hotel room, Special Agent Pride and the team are asked to break standard protocol for the murder investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Unable to trust anyone in New Orleans, the NCIS team calls in FBI Assistant Director Isler to help expose and stop the sinister scheme Mayor Hamilton has planned for the residents of Clearwater.Guests: Derek Webster..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While Pride remains on probation six weeks after his rogue takedown of the corrupt Mayor Hamilton, his team is closely monitored. Also, when the FBI arrives to run lead on a case involving a stolen rig of nuclear waste the team must investigate.Guests: Becky Ann Baker..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: While preparing to leave on a fishing trip, Martha Roberts, an erratic whistleblower who calls Pride her mentor, kidnaps him to help her locate a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.Guests: Dendrie Taylor..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride and his team join forces with FBI Director Isler after a Russian operative disappears after his navy escort is murdered. Also, Tammy partners with former sleeper agent Eva Azorova to locate the missing operative who Eva has known since childhood.Guests: Cassidy Freeman, Derek Webster..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the copycat murder of an unsolved case from 150 years ago that spawned a legendary New Orleans ghost story.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian is placed on administrative leave after his response in a foot chase to apprehend a high value fugitive is questioned by the FBI. Also, while Pride and the team continue to track the target, they attempt to clear Sebastian's name.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A powerful vampire plots to use the blood of the legendary Daywalker Blade, a half-vampire with all the strengths of vampires and none of their weaknesses, to summon a mighty Blood God.
